div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 270 Olympia, Elis, 1939 Burial: c. 145-140 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 850 AR. From excavations Aenianes: triob. Lamia: triob. Thebae, Thessaly: triob. Phocis: triob. Locri Opuntii: triob. Boeotian mints: dr.; triob. Chalcis: dr. Histiaea: dr. Aegina: dr. Sicyon: triob. Achaean League: c. 630 triob. Megalopolis: c. 50 triob. Other Pelop. mints: triob. Rhodes: didr. Disposition: Olympia Dengate, ANSMN 13 (1967), pp. 57-110, illus. (Megalopolis) Thompson, NNM 159 (1968), pp. 110-15 (Achaean League) Warren, ANSMN 15 (1969), pp. 31-40 (Mega- lopolis) Information from Margildis Schl√ºter
